backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with hotel, room, booking, payment, invite-token, and access-control data types and storage maps, forming the core state model for the hotel booking system.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence reports linking features to affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels for traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend files including routes, hooks, components, pages, and build metadata.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, light/dark themes, and global visual settings.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the root React app with title, favicon, meta tags, and main script.
frontend/REGRESSION_CHECKLIST.md: Detailed pre‑release regression checklist covering authentication, bookings, payments, hotel management, and cleanup verification steps.
frontend/RELEASE_NOTES.md: Release notes template with sections for V33, V40+, and V39 describing deploy verification, cleanup tasks, and known issues.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the React app with routing, auth gates, query client, and page routes including admin and hotel areas.
frontend/src/buildInfo.ts: Exports the current build version string.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminBooki: Displays an admin table of all bookings with hotel info, status, and details, including loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/admin/CaffeineDe: Shows an informational admin alert about a known deploy UI issue on the Caffeine platform.
frontend/src/components/admin/DataCleanu: Provides admin tools to remove legacy room photos and payment methods by hotel principal and room ID.
frontend/src/components/admin/HotelVisib: Allows admins to view hotels and update their active and subscription statuses.
frontend/src/components/admin/InviteToke: Enables admins to generate, validate, and manage hotel invite tokens tied to principal IDs.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message, showing required roles and optional hotel activation form, with navigation options.
frontend/src/components/auth/GuardErrorS: Shows an error when permission checks fail and provides retry and home navigation actions.
frontend/src/components/auth/HotelActiva: Form for validating and consuming an invite token to activate a hotel account with related query refresh and navigation.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileComp: Ensures authenticated users complete basic profile data before accessing content, showing a modal form when needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Gate component that blocks access until the user logs in via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Checks user role and optional hotel activation status, showing loading, error, or access-denied screens as needed.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingD: Dialog showing detailed booking information, pricing, dates, and optional guest principal copy action.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingF: Booking form that validates dates and guest counts, calculates price, and submits a booking request using user identity.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingS: Displays a booking status badge with variant and label determined by booking status.
frontend/src/components/booking/MyBookin: Shows the current user's bookings with details, cancellation options, and loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/common/ImagePrev: Dialog for previewing an image with a title and close button.
frontend/src/components/debug/AuthDiagno: Diagnostic panel showing authentication state, principal, role, admin status, and hotel profile info.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelBooki: Displays bookings for the hotel owner with actions to confirm or cancel bookings and full loading/error handling.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelPayme: Panel for hotel owners to view, add, and remove payment methods with form handling and validation.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelProfi: Form panel that loads, displays, and updates a hotel's profile details with validation and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RecordStay: Static panel showing that stay-recording is unavailable until backend booking features are implemented.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RoomPhotos: Displays room photos with fallback handling and optional compact layout, supporting clickable thumbnails and failed-image tracking.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RoomsPanel: UI for creating and editing hotel rooms, including image uploads, room details, and integration with backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/hotel/Subscripti: Shows subscription status for a hotel with badges, alerts, and optional contact instructions depending on activation state.
App layout wrapper providing navigation, content area, and footer displaying build info.
frontend/src/components/nav/LanguageSele: Language selection dropdown currently supporting English, using locale context.
frontend/src/components/nav/TopNav.tsx: Top navigation bar with authentication actions, routing links, role-based admin/hotel options, and language selector.
frontend/src/components/payments/Contact: Component showing admin contact and payment methods for hotel activation or subscription, with WhatsApp/email actions and static payment info.
frontend/src/components/payments/HotelPa: Displays hotel-specific payment methods and contact links for guest bookings, conditionally rendered based on data availability.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, auto-refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, logout, stored identities, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user roles, profiles, hotel activation status, and related backend operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoomImageUpload.ts: Hook handling image uploads by converting files to data URLs with progress tracking and simulated upload flow.
frontend/src/i18n/LocaleContext.tsx: Context provider storing and updating the app locale, persisted in localStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, themes, and base styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AccountStatusPage.tsx: Displays user identity, role, hotel activation state, and allows invite token validation, consumption, and admin self‑elevation.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Admin dashboard hosting panels for invite tokens, hotel visibility, bookings, cleanup, and deployment notices.
frontend/src/pages/BrowseHotelsPage.tsx: Fetches and lists hotels with images and navigation to details, handling loading, empty states, and image preview.
frontend/src/pages/GuestAccountPage.tsx: Guest account hub showing navigation to bookings and account status plus the user's bookings table.
frontend/src/pages/HotelAreaPage.tsx: Hotel management portal with tabs for profile, rooms, payments, bookings, stays, and subscription, with load/error handling.
frontend/src/pages/HotelDetailPage.tsx: Displays a specific hotel's details, rooms, photos, payment methods, and booking form.
frontend/src/pages/MainMenuPage.tsx: Landing menu choosing guest or hotel portal based on auth, role, and hotel activation state.
frontend/src/pages/MyBookingsPage.tsx: A React page that displays the user's bookings and provides navigation cards for browsing hotels and viewing account status.
frontend/src/types/extended-backend.ts: Type definitions mirroring backend data structures and API interfaces for hotels, rooms, bookings, profiles, and admin operations.
frontend/src/utils/debugFlags.ts: Utility to detect whether debug mode is enabled based on environment or URL parameters.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Currency utilities for formatting money values and validating supported currency codes.
frontend/src/utils/roomPictures.ts: Helpers for validating, filtering, and tracking failed room picture URLs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using both search and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with extended theme colors, animations, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Project state file summarizing current issues, features, and pending requests for the SGO-Booking app.
